Title: Enacts the "billing transparency act"
Summary: Enacts the "billing transparency act"; provides that every utility corporation, energy services corporation and municipality shall provide an itemized breakdown of customers' bills each month; provides that electric utility corporations, energy services companies and municipalities shall maintain a dedicated and easily accessible customer website that explains customer charges.
LawCode: Amd ยง44, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to enacting the "billing transparency act"
